**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 48 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 [Unshadowed Mariama](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1805) **Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 20 **Perception** +30 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +31, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31 **Str** +1 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** +5 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +27 **Will** +33 **HP** 270 **Resistances** [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) 20 **Shadow's Displeasure** When Mariama has fewer than 150 Hit Points, her shadow pulls at her essence to show the Vesicant Egg's displeasure. She looks pained and confused, and she becomes [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) until healed to 150 Hit Points or more. These conditions increase to 2 when below 100 Hit Points. When below 50 Hit Points, she falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
**Vesicated Shadow** Mariama's shadow has become corrupted via the power of the Vesicant Egg. Her shredded shadow grants her some control over acid and shadows. She gains a +4 status bonus to resist [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) and [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143) effects.
**Weird Astrology** Perhaps because of Mariama's quirky nature, she has received all the effects of the astrological evaluator. When she gains any of the clumsy, [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), or stupefied conditions, she reduces the value by 1. This means her Shadow's Displeasure doesn't affect her until she has fewer than 50 Hit Points, when she falls unconscious. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** fist +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 3d4+4 bludgeoning **Occult Prepared Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) - **2nd** [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214) - **3rd** [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Hypnotic Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=157), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) - **4th** [Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) - **5th** [Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327), [Synesthesia](/Spells.aspx?ID=328) - **6th** [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Spellwrack](/Spells.aspx?ID=298), [Vibrant Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=357) - **7th** [Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) - **8th** [Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73), [Spiritual Epidemic](/Spells.aspx?ID=304), [Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) - **9th** [Foresight](/Spells.aspx?ID=127), [Synesthesia](/Spells.aspx?ID=328), [Unfathomable Song](/Spells.aspx?ID=349) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **9th** [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) (acid only; ×2), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274) (×2) **Witch Hexes** DC 40, 3 Focus Points - **Cantrips (9th)** [Nudge Fate](/Spells.aspx?ID=802) - **9th** [Blood Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=791), [Cackle](/Spells.aspx?ID=792), [Curse of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=794), [Malicious Shadow](/Spells.aspx?ID=800) **Bind Destinies** ([Abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Mariama ties her fate with that of another creature within 30 feet. The creature must attempt a DC 40 Will save. Regardless of the result of its save, the creature is temporarily immune for 1 day.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The two fates are bound. Whenever Mariama takes damage, the creature takes damage of the same type equal to half the damage Mariama took (DC 37 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). Immunities, resistances, and weaknesses still apply as normal. The creature can attempt to sever the bond by spending an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to attempt another DC 40 Will save. On a success, the bond is severed, and the effect ends. The bond also ends when Mariama falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), or if she actively ends the effect herself as a free action.
**Failure** As success, but the creature takes damage equal to the full amount Mariama took. Severing the bond requires a 2-action activity, which has the concentrate trait.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the basic Fortitude save is DC 40. Severing the bond requires a 3-action activity, which has the concentrate trait. **Rupture Shadow** ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)) Mariama can create immense blisters on a creature's shadow, which immediately burst, dealing 20d6 acid damage. She targets a creature within 60 feet that is casting a shadow, which must attempt a DC 37 Will save. Mariama can't use Rupture Shadow again for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune for 1 day.
**Success** The target takes half damage. The bursting shadow deals 5 acid [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage to all creatures within 5 feet of the target.
**Failure** The target takes full damage, and the bursting shadow deals 10 acid splash damage.
**Critical Failure** The target takes double damage, the bursting shadow deals 20 acid splash damage, and the target also takes 4d6 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
name: Unshadowed Mariama
